subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Joe Nesci has 421 career victories as men’s basketball coach at New York University, which began competing in Division III the season before he joined the staff as an assistant.
snippet: Joe Nesci has 421 career victories as men’s basketball coach at New York University, which began competing in Division III the season before he joined the staff as an assistant.
